blog.name: maplestardust
blog.title: Space and super powers
blog.description:
I reblog art I like on here sometimes, but mostly reblog it to my on my main speedbee!
A blog for my own art, the more 
SFW kind (no explicit sexual material at least, blood and gore aren't going to be strangers on this blog. Everything will be properly tagged). You'll find fanart and original content here. For my NSFW art blog, please PM me (must be 18+).
Enjoy your stay!
Please don't tag my art as "kin".
I track #maplestardust

tags: pretty happy with how it turned out!
the symbol is always so mean to me
I gotta figure out a way to draw it that doesn't give me grief
'Matt why don't you draw Spider-Man more if you love him so much?'
the answer is I'm horrible at actually sitting down and drawing things
I plan to change that this year
summary: I’ve been wanting to practice more dynamic poses, and who better to use as a guinea pig than your friendly neighbourhood...
caption:
I’ve been wanting to practice more dynamic poses, and who better to use as a guinea pig than your friendly neighbourhood Spider-Man?

Also went to add more lineart shading then got…carried away. But that’s ok! This is a picture all about experimenting, and I had fun. Hope you all enjoy!

reblog.comment:
I’ve been wanting to practice more dynamic poses, and who better to use as a guinea pig than your friendly neighbourhood Spider-Man?

Also went to add more lineart shading then got…carried away. But that’s ok! This is a picture all about experimenting, and I had fun. Hope you all enjoy!

summary: The trailer for Spider-Man: Far From Home is here!🕷🕸 - If you want to avoid spoilers, I suggest you stop reading now (I’m sorry,...
caption:
The trailer for Spider-Man: Far From Home is here!🕷🕸
-
If you want to avoid spoilers, I suggest you stop reading now (I’m sorry, they aren’t technically spoilers for the movie, but the synopsis basically spoils Avengers: Endgame)
⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️
The film takes place AFTER Avengers: Endgame, with Peter Parker going on summer vacation to Europe, where he teams up with Mysterio to battle the Elementals.
-
The film stars Tom Holland, Zendaya, Jon Faverau, Marisa Tomei, Jacob Batalon, Samuel L Jackson and Cobie Smulders reprising their MCU roles, with Jake Gyllenhaal joining the cast as Mysterio.
-
Spider-Man: Far Frome Home is set to hit cinemas July 2019!🕷🕸

summary: Prompt 11 with MJ and peter 💞
question: Prompt 11 with MJ and peter 💞
answer:
Prompt: 11. “You said forever.”

Pairing: College!Peter Parker x College!MJ

Word Count: 908

Summary: Peter got home from a mission to see something he wish he didn’t…

Peter walked up the stairs to his apartment. It was getting late and he was beyond exhausted from the fight. He was supposed to go back to the compound for a check-up and to give a report on how his part of the mission went but he so badly wanted to get home to MJ. He hadn’t seen her all day since he had to leave early and he couldn’t wait to lay in her arms tonight. When he got to his door it was locked which was strange because MJ never locked it unless she knew he wasn’t coming home and he had reminded her that he was.

He took out his keys and unlocked it. Quietly stepping in and dropping his keys into the bowl by the door. He slipped his shoes off and hung his jacket on the hook. As he started walking down the hallway he heard noises coming from their bedroom. He figured she just fell asleep with the TVs on, again.

He opened the door and to his horror he saw MJ on top of Flash, they both were completely naked. MJ turned around to the sound of the door opened and when she saw Peter standing there she jumped off of Flash and grabbed the sheet to cover herself. Peter felt like he couldn’t breath.

“Pete, didn’t think you’d be home so soon.” Flash said looking shocked and worried about what was about to come. Peter stood there for a moment trying to truly process what he just saw. His girlfriend of two years was just fucking the guy that had bullied Peter all through high school. He moved over from in front of the door and pointed.

“Out.” Peter said holding back tears.

“That’s not very good manners.” Flash joked as he stayed sitting.

“Flash I said get out before I make you.” Peter said flatly to him. He had tears welling up in his eyes and he really didn’t want him to see him like this. Flash stood up and grabbed his clothes. He quickly got dressed and left. Once Peter heard the door close he walked over to the bed and sat with his back to MJ.

“I didn’t mean for you to know about this.” MJ said as she crawled across the bed and put her hands onto his shoulders. He rolled his shoulders to get her hands off of him and he just sighed.

“I would hope you didn’t want me to see that.” He said. No joking in his voice, no sweetness like he usually spoke with around MJ. All that came from his tone was hurt, and emptiness. Brokenness.

“I didn’t mean to hurt you. It’s just I haven’t been able to see you as much lately and I needed something-“ She said quietly trying not to set anything off. With those words he jumped up and scoffed at her.

“So this is my fault? I try so hard to make time for you, but this is my fault? You’re the only thing keeping me happy right now. You’re the reason I’m glad to come home from missions. The reason I skip rundowns and check-ups.” His voice cracked as he talked and he couldn’t hold it back anymore. He fell to the ground and started crying.

MJ tried to comfort him but he just moved away from her and tried to steady is breathing. Once he had it under control he faced back to her. His face was puffy and his lip was still trembling lie it always did when he was holding back tears. It made MJ hate herself how she could do this to him. She went to say something but he cut her off.

“You said forever, Michelle. You told me that we were forever and I believed you.” He looked into her eyes and she saw all the hurt he was feeling.

“I meant it. I meant it every time I said it. I just can’t be alone like this anymore.” She spoke truthfully. He sat there thinking over what she had said.

“Meant…” he whispered to himself but she heard him say it.

“I think you should leave tomorrow. You can stay here tonight but tomorrow I want you to leave. You can take the bed and I’ll go stay with Tony tonight.”” Peter stood up and left the room. He left MJ sitting on the floor with nothing but a sheet covering her. As Peter walked through the door with tears running down his face something clicked.

Peter sat up in his bed breathing heavy. MJ was holding his hand staring at him with wide eyes and her was a mess meaning she had just woken up.

“You had a bad dream, love.” MJ soothed him by rubbing circles on his hand. She helped him steady his breathing and she moved her hand to his back to try to calm him better. He looked att her and kissed her passionately. She eased into it and started kissing him back. Once he pulled away he just stared into his eyes for a moment.

“It was a terrible, terrible dream.” He said laying back down. MJ laid down with him and got herself comfortable snuggled against him.

“How about you tell me all about it tomorrow, love. Tonight lets just go to sleep and have nice dreams.” She smiled up at him and ran her fingers lightly through his hair.

“I think you should leave tomorrow. You can stay here tonight but tomorrow I want you to leave. You can take the bed and I’ll go stay with Tony tonight.”” Peter stood up and left the room. He left MJ sitting on the floor with nothing but a sheet covering her. As Peter walked through the door with tears running down his face something clicked.

Peter sat up in his bed breathing heavy. MJ was holding his hand staring at him with wide eyes and her was a mess meaning she had just woken up.

“You had a bad dream, love.” MJ soothed him by rubbing circles on his hand. She helped him steady his breathing and she moved her hand to his back to try to calm him better. He looked att her and kissed her passionately. She eased into it and started kissing him back. Once he pulled away he just stared into his eyes for a moment.

“It was a terrible, terrible dream.” He said laying back down. MJ laid down with him and got herself comfortable snuggled against him.

“How about you tell me all about it tomorrow, love. Tonight lets just go to sleep and have nice dreams.” She smiled up at him and ran her fingers lightly through his hair.
trail.content:
Prompt: 11. “You said forever.”

Pairing: College!Peter Parker x College!MJ

Word Count: 908

Summary: Peter got home from a mission to see something he wish he didn’t…

Peter walked up the stairs to his apartment. It was getting late and he was beyond exhausted from the fight. He was supposed to go back to the compound for a check-up and to give a report on how his part of the mission went but he so badly wanted to get home to MJ. He hadn’t seen her all day since he had to leave early and he couldn’t wait to lay in her arms tonight. When he got to his door it was locked which was strange because MJ never locked it unless she knew he wasn’t coming home and he had reminded her that he was.

He took out his keys and unlocked it. Quietly stepping in and dropping his keys into the bowl by the door. He slipped his shoes off and hung his jacket on the hook. As he started walking down the hallway he heard noises coming from their bedroom. He figured she just fell asleep with the TVs on, again.

He opened the door and to his horror he saw MJ on top of Flash, they both were completely naked. MJ turned around to the sound of the door opened and when she saw Peter standing there she jumped off of Flash and grabbed the sheet to cover herself. Peter felt like he couldn’t breath.

“Pete, didn’t think you’d be home so soon.” Flash said looking shocked and worried about what was about to come. Peter stood there for a moment trying to truly process what he just saw. His girlfriend of two years was just fucking the guy that had bullied Peter all through high school. He moved over from in front of the door and pointed.

“Out.” Peter said holding back tears.

“That’s not very good manners.” Flash joked as he stayed sitting.

“Flash I said get out before I make you.” Peter said flatly to him. He had tears welling up in his eyes and he really didn’t want him to see him like this. Flash stood up and grabbed his clothes. He quickly got dressed and left. Once Peter heard the door close he walked over to the bed and sat with his back to MJ.

“I didn’t mean for you to know about this.” MJ said as she crawled across the bed and put her hands onto his shoulders. He rolled his shoulders to get her hands off of him and he just sighed.

“I would hope you didn’t want me to see that.” He said. No joking in his voice, no sweetness like he usually spoke with around MJ. All that came from his tone was hurt, and emptiness. Brokenness.

“I didn’t mean to hurt you. It’s just I haven’t been able to see you as much lately and I needed something-“ She said quietly trying not to set anything off. With those words he jumped up and scoffed at her.

“So this is my fault? I try so hard to make time for you, but this is my fault? You’re the only thing keeping me happy right now. You’re the reason I’m glad to come home from missions. The reason I skip rundowns and check-ups.” His voice cracked as he talked and he couldn’t hold it back anymore. He fell to the ground and started crying.

MJ tried to comfort him but he just moved away from her and tried to steady is breathing. Once he had it under control he faced back to her. His face was puffy and his lip was still trembling lie it always did when he was holding back tears. It made MJ hate herself how she could do this to him. She went to say something but he cut her off.

“You said forever, Michelle. You told me that we were forever and I believed you.” He looked into her eyes and she saw all the hurt he was feeling.

“I meant it. I meant it every time I said it. I just can’t be alone like this anymore.” She spoke truthfully. He sat there thinking over what she had said.

“Meant…” he whispered to himself but she heard him say it.

“I think you should leave tomorrow. You can stay here tonight but tomorrow I want you to leave. You can take the bed and I’ll go stay with Tony tonight.”” Peter stood up and left the room. He left MJ sitting on the floor with nothing but a sheet covering her. As Peter walked through the door with tears running down his face something clicked.

Peter sat up in his bed breathing heavy. MJ was holding his hand staring at him with wide eyes and her was a mess meaning she had just woken up.

“You had a bad dream, love.” MJ soothed him by rubbing circles on his hand. She helped him steady his breathing and she moved her hand to his back to try to calm him better. He looked att her and kissed her passionately. She eased into it and started kissing him back. Once he pulled away he just stared into his eyes for a moment.

“It was a terrible, terrible dream.” He said laying back down. MJ laid down with him and got herself comfortable snuggled against him.

“How about you tell me all about it tomorrow, love. Tonight lets just go to sleep and have nice dreams.” She smiled up at him and ran her fingers lightly through his hair.
